SourceField.help: Select the field that you want the Editor to connect to. The text field needs to be on the layout, although it can be offscreen.
SourceField.label: Rich Text HTML

Theme.help: The theme to use for the Editor. Snow and Bubble are the best options. Core is just for display
Theme.label: Style

ReadOnly.help: This is a good option for displaying the rich text without the editing features.
ReadOnly.label: Read only
